snippet: Bradley Wright-Phillips scored his Major League Soccer-leading 18th goal of the season and the 10-man Red Bulls beat the New England Revolution, 2-1, in Harrison, N.J.
abstract: New York Red Bulls beat New England Revolution, 2-1; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Bradley Wright-Phillips scored his Major League Soccer-leading 18th goal of the season and the 10-man Red Bulls beat the New England Revolution, 2-1, in Harrison, N.J.
